command.projecte.knowledge.invalid: The item "%s" does not  have an EMC value, and cannot be learnt.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.l: Requires holding shift to display the learnt/unlearnt text as a tooltip on items and blocks. Note: this does nothing if EMC Tooltips are disabled.
configuration.projecte.common.crafting.f: Require full omega klein stars in the tome of knowledge and gem armour recipes. This is the same behavior that EE2 had.
configuration.projecte.processing.data_c: Calculates EMC value of trimmed armour.
configuration.projecte.server.difficulty: Set to false to disable Gem Armour offensive abilities (helmet zap and chestplate explosion).
configuration.projecte.server.misc.unsaf: False requires your hand be empty for Gem Armour Offensive Abilities to be readied or triggered.
tooltip.projecte.tome: Unlocks all transmutation knowledge when learnt
